data.name: STRIDE: Fates
data.description:
MEET YOUR FATE

Raised in the slums of dystopian Airon City, at the very bottom of the food chain, you got a golden ticket out.

To survive and climb the ladder in elite police forces of SkyChase, you will have to deal with power shifts in gangs, dirty family feuds, corporate secrets, forbidden tech and much more. Your fate is bound with other motley characters in this story. Will you accept the destiny or fight against it?

FEEL LIKE A PARKOUR SPEC-OPS OFFICER

◉ Climb buildings, vault through windows, and slide down cables with lightning speed.
◉ Explore open locations under the watch of snipers and drones.
◉ Feel the thrill of close-quarters combat with tactical shooter gameplay.
◉ Use your gadgets and hacking skills to outwit thugs and corporates.

From dirty slums to affluent skyscrapers, you will visit many places to enjoy the view and challenge your reflexes in action-packed gameplay.

TECHNOLOGICAL LEAP

Reworked STRIDE Engine offers advanced levels of graphics, physics, and interactivity on standalone VR.

We've refined every aspect of the original STRIDE. When you run, battle, interact with characters, or solve puzzles, you can expect a major leap in technology.

changelog.change_log:
STRIDE: Fates Update v1.07_942bb07

We have made a number of sound and gameplay changes:
- Added a tutorial on how to use hand pockets
- Added button mapping. Now you can customize and swap the sticks and all active buttons (except the Trigger and Grab buttons)
- Added music during the timer in the Snakes of the Old Town mission
- Changed sounds in the Hanzo's Wrath mission
- Updated music in the arenas

We also fixed a number of bugs:
- Fixed a problem with the starting save when replaying missions if the player died during the mission. Now the player is revived at the beginning of the mission
- Fixed a problem with the mount, which remained hanging in the air after the death of the player in the mission Welcome to Airon City. Now it disappears after the player's death.

STRIDE: Fates Update v1.06_ef67211

We have fixed a number of bugs:
Fixed an issue where enemies couldn't find the player because of head accessories, now the headwear doesn't interfere with enemies' vision
Fixed a bug with the Fury of the Storm mission could not start if the player skipped a questpoint, now the mission starts correctly
Fixed a bug with weapons disappearing from the upgrade table, now weapons stay on the upgrade table.
Added correct door collisions in the Fury of the Storm mission

We also have made a number of visual, sound and gameplay changes:
Improved visuals of the bullet trace piercing glass
Added the ability for the laser ray to pass through glass
Improved visuals when killing an enemy who has a headwear on with a knife to the head.
Added glass breaking sounds
Improved enemy behavior. Enemies now react to the noise of breaking glass
Added damage decrease on enemies when hitting pieces of headwear / armor  (Enemies will take different damage when they get hit in the body directly or through the headwear / armor)

STRIDE: Fates update (v 1.05_b957778) 

We fixed a number of bugs and crashes:
Fixed crash when opening the equipment.
Fixed crash when destroying objects.
Fixed crash during the quests to deliver an object.
Fixed crash when destroying enemies in arenas.
Fixed a problem with decay after dying over chasms.

Sound changes:
Updated the voice acting in the Hanzo's Wrath mission.
Updated weapon sounds.
Updated the music in the Neuro-Abyss mission.

Visual changes:
Adjusted the render distance on missions: Fury of the Storm, To the Sky.
Improved the visuals of glass breaking.
Added new weapon skins for everyone (as an apology for issues with save files).
Added new accessories for enemies like caps, masks, etc.

Physics and gameplay changes:
Added the ability for enemies to destroy physical objects with shots.
Made more convenient interaction with all levers.
Made a more convenient system of climbing in vents.
Removed the light quest in the ventilation during the Lethal Treatment Mission.

The first patch (v1.01)

1. Fixed issues with saves.

There's a chance that some players may even be able to restore their previous saves. 
Please update the game and check if you can continue from your last checkpoint. If not, you can also check the cloud saves and try restoring* a save via https://secure.oculus.com/my/cloud-backup/

*Unless you are trying to restore a save made in a beta version of the game. Just please don't do this, the pre-release saves are incompatible with the current build, and we don't know how many potential problems this action can cause. 

2. Adjusted pistol shooting angle (will also add a customizable setting for that in the future)
3. Adjusted pistol recoil
4. Balanced shotgun damage (reduced it)
5. Improved the weapon holsters behind your back
